EmailTemplate.subject: Important paperwork for your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to let you know that we have mailed out important paperwork regarding your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Please keep an eye out for the documents in your mailbox.
If you have any questions or concerns about the paperwork or your case, please don't hesitate to give us a call at {!Organization.Phone}. Our team of experts is always here to help you.
Thank you for choosing us to handle your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards, Saddle Rock Legal Group {!Organization.Phone}
